name: Escape from Mars(not finished)
description:
The Interface is supposed to be used by a touchscreen but can also be used by simply clicking with the mouse.

To press switches simply click. To move buttons back to Default simply hold the button.

Once launched turn on radar with power button.

After Locating station, start hyperdrive sequence. Once set, press Z to go into hyperdrive

Launch sequence:

Both Thrusters MUST be ON!

Ignition Relay sequence is as followed: Off,On,On,Off,On,On,On,Off.

Thruster Output MUST be set to 47.

HyperDrive Sequence:

All Hyper Switches MUST be ON!

Thruster output MUST be set to 100.
